an3.146:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.146:1.3: Akusalena kayakammena, akusalena vacikammena, akusalena manokammena—
an3.146:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an3.146:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an3.146:2.3: Kusalena kayakammena, kusalena vacikammena, kusalena manokammena—
an3.146:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
